verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: falsely] [V: declared] [ARG1: victory] [ARGM-TMP: after his meeting with North Korea 's leader] and twisted history in celebrating Tuesday 's summit with Kim Jong In .
